verbose_text: We thus asked whether the higher PDL1 and PDL2 expression by Smad7 -/- DCs, as well as the increased PD1 induction on T cells by Smad7 -/- DCs, serve as an additional signal to promote Foxp3 + Treg development.
evidence: PDL2 expression by Smad7 -/-  DCs, as well as the increased PD1 induction on T cells by Smad7 -/-  DCs, serve as an additional signal to promote Foxp3
